description: This file contains utility functions related to QEMU target configuration, parsing environment variables for target architectures, and generating lists of target specifications such as system and usermode targets.

methods.name: get_qemu_usermode_target_list
methods.description: Filters the target list to include only user-mode targets ending with '-linux-user'.

methods.name: get_qemu_system_target_list
methods.description: Filters the target list to include only system targets, excluding user-mode targets.
